DOC.brief_title: A Study To Assess The Safety Of PF-05335810 In Hypercholesterolemic Subjects
DOC.criteria: On stable daily dos statin 45 day prior receive study treatment . Fasting LDL C equal great 80 mg/dL screen visit approximately 1 week prior randomization . History cardiovascular cerebrovascular event procedure within one year randomization . Poorly control type 1 type 2 diabetes mellitus ( define HbA1c > 9 % ) .
